jinngine.physics.force
Class SpringForce

java.lang.Object
  jinngine.physics.force.SpringForce
All Implemented Interfaces:
Force
public class SpringForce
extends java.lang.Object
implements Force

Models a spring mounted between two bodies, at points pa and pb. The initial distance between pa and pb will be the equilibrium length of the spring (where the acting force will be zero). The SpringForce models the two classical parameters for a spring force, the force and damping coefficients. The spring force equation is

F = -k e x - v d

where x is the unit vector pointing from pa to pb, e is the deviation from the equilibrium length, k is the force coefficient, v is the velocity of the spring ( v = u x ) and d is the damping coefficient.
